meta.description: Over a 6-week period, 5 dogs that recently received the leptospirosis vaccine were taken to veterinary neurologists with symptoms of autoimmune meningitis.

title: Watch Out for These Allergic Reaction to Vaccine in Your Pets
cleaned_text: According to one Chicago area veterinary neurologist, "In the last year to year-and-a-half, we have seen more cases in this practice related to dogs who have recently been vaccinated”

opengraph.title: Watch Out for These Allergic Reaction to Vaccine in Your Pets
opengraph.description: Over a 6-week period, 5 dogs that recently received the leptospirosis vaccine were taken to veterinary neurologists with symptoms of autoimmune meningitis.
